name: RTCRtpSender.getStats
description: The RTCRtpSender method getStats() asynchronously requests an RTCStatsReport object which provides statistics about outgoing traffic on the RTCPeerConnection which owns the sender, returning a Promise which is fulfilled when the results are available.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
refs.description: The definition of 'RTCRtpSender.getStats()' in the 'WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers' specification.
